summary: 1999 FORD WINDSTAR PROBLEMS WITH TRANSMISSION, POSSIBLE DEFECT PARTS.  *MR  THE CONSUMER REPLACED THE ENTIRE POWER STEERING ASSEMBLY.  THE CONSUMER PREVIOUSLY OWNED A 1996 FORD WINDSTAR WHICH HAD A TRANSMISSION PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE REPAIR COST.  *SCC   *JB
